column5: Programme description   Your chance to play a vital role in protecting and conserving the environment starts here.   We continue to have a significant impact on our planet through actions such as:    the use of natural resources   deforestation   soil erosion   the release of pollutants and pathogens   invasive species   the increase in greenhouse gases    These are the result of human behavior and are all examples of pressures that have potentially severe consequences for humanity and other life on Earth.
